news.title: Windhoek Wasps Clinch Victory in Thrilling Match
news.content: In an exciting match at the Windhoek Hockey Stadium, the Windhoek Wasps emerged victorious against the Coastal Sharks with a score of 3-2. John Smith scored the winning goal in the final minutes of the game.
news.author: Sarah Johnson

news.title: National Team Selection Announced
news.content: The Namibian Hockey Federation has announced the national team selection for the upcoming African Championship. The squad includes players from various clubs, with a strong representation from the Desert Eagles.
news.author: Michael van der Merwe

news.title: Youth Development Program Launches
news.content: A new youth development program has been launched in partnership with all major clubs. The program aims to nurture young talent and create a sustainable pipeline for future hockey stars.
news.author: David Shikongo
